name: Boss Media
overview:
Boss Media AB engages in the development and supply of e-gaming software and solutions. Its products include slots, video poker, blackjack, craps, and roulette; poker; lottery and bingo; fixed-odds games; and probability games. The company provides customized solutions for gaming and betting corporations who provide their customers with interactive games through Internet-enabled personal computers, mobile phones, and handheld computers, as well as through interactive digital television or interactive video terminal systems. Boss Media also offers supplementary services, such as operation and maintenance of gaming systems, support, and payment management. In addition, it develops server-based multiplayer games for various digital distribution channels. The companyâ€™s customers include licensed gaming companies, betting companies, land-based casino companies, Internet operators, media companies, and Internet portals. Boss Media has a strategic alliance with Jadestone Group AB and Accenture. It operates primarily in Europe and North America.

The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Vaxjo, Sweden.
